lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump’s clash with a Muslim couple whose Army captain son was killed in Iraq has turned a spotlight on Muslims in the United States military.

headline.print_headline: Muslims in Military Find Faith Is Accepted
headline.main: Muslims in the Military: The Few, the Proud, the Welcome

snippet: Donald J. Trump’s clash with a Muslim couple whose Army captain son was killed in Iraq has turned a spotlight on Muslims in the United States military....
abstract: Among Muslims who are veterans or are on active duty in United States armed forces, many say they find support and acceptance, and note that military has made accommodations for daily prayers and dietary restrictions; most admit, however, that there are still numerous cultural obstacles and challenges to overcome.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
